      • setUrl

        public void setUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Navigate to a URL.
        Parameters:
        url - URL

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize()
        Create the browser canvas component. This must be called after the parent application Frame is made visible - usually directly after frame.setVisible(true). This method creates the background thread, which in turn creates the SWT components and handles the SWT event dispatch loop. This method will block (for a very short time) until that thread has successfully created the native browser component (or an error occurs).
        Returns:
        true if the browser component was successfully created; false if it was not

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose the browser canvas component.
